snippet: A number of signs indicated the economy had recovered from a rough winter, with consumer borrowing expanding and unemployment holding steady.
abstract: Stock market moves higher on brightening economic news and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index notched another nominal high, its eighth in 10 days.
lead_paragraph: A number of signs indicated the economy had recovered from a rough winter, with consumer borrowing expanding and unemployment holding steady.

headline.main: Markets Head Higher, Lifted by Abundance of Rosy Economic Data
headline.print_headline: Markets Head Higher, Lifted by Abundance of Rosy Economic Data
